Articles.Content:
Well, I finally broke 1000 posts, and I decided to cook up something special for you guys to celebrate.

Here it is: *Yukon's Plane and Rocket Utilities!*

These consist of subassemblies.

[Download (Zip file with subassemblies inside)](https://www.dropbox.com/s/eujxqy9xz37bxgm/Yukon%27s%20Utilities.7z?dl=0)

RATO Booster

Small detachable booster with 6 seconds burn time, useful for getting medium-sized planes in the air.

[![screenshot25314_zpskwelbbzq.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25314_zpskwelbbzq.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25314_zpskwelbbzq.png.html)

Pico Jet Engine

Despite what it says on the label, there's an Ion engine in there.

[![screenshot25319_zpsuuvulugz.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25319_zpsuuvulugz.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25319_zpsuuvulugz.png.html)

Pico Air Intake

A small, nonfunctional air intake.

[![screenshot25318_zpscpkhk6ma.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25318_zpscpkhk6ma.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25318_zpscpkhk6ma.png.html)

Spudnik Command Pod

Seats one, and comes with a reaction wheel and power source.

[![screenshot25336_zpslniki6mm.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25336_zpslniki6mm.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25336_zpslniki6mm.png.html)

Inline Command Pod

An inline cabin that seats one.

[![screenshot25339_zpsjdjlwje5.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25339_zpsjdjlwje5.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25339_zpsjdjlwje5.png.html)

[![screenshot25340_zpsagc1ue1e.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25340_zpsagc1ue1e.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25340_zpsagc1ue1e.png.html)

[![screenshot25341_zpswdrn93h3.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25341_zpswdrn93h3.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25341_zpswdrn93h3.png.html)

Mini LK Lander

A miniature LK-style lander powered by RCS, graded for small bodies. Holds one.

[![screenshot25373_zpsjd0mvhyb.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25373_zpsjd0mvhyb.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25373_zpsjd0mvhyb.png.html)

[![screenshot25368_zpsk4cof1hl.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25368_zpsk4cof1hl.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25368_zpsk4cof1hl.png.html)

LGBL Lander

A small lander styled after one of Bobcat's old mods. Seats one.

[![screenshot25375_zpsmhjm4yox.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25375_zpsmhjm4yox.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25375_zpsmhjm4yox.png.html)

[![screenshot25378_zps6pbzmbpt.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25378_zps6pbzmbpt.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25378_zps6pbzmbpt.png.html)

Pico Ducted Fan

A small, nonfunctional duct fan.

[![screenshot25379_zpspqib5oyo.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25379_zpspqib5oyo.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25379_zpspqib5oyo.png.html)

Linear Aerospike

A custom aerospike engine.

[![screenshot217_zpsarxprgd3.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot217_zpsarxprgd3.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot217_zpsarxprgd3.png.html)

[![screenshot228_zpsbecxxtcs.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot228_zpsbecxxtcs.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot228_zpsbecxxtcs.png.html)

Kicker-A

Small booster stage based off RL solid fuel stages.

[![screenshot246_zpsbrsgnvow.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot246_zpsbrsgnvow.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot246_zpsbrsgnvow.png.html)

[![screenshot249_zps0sspwppx.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot249_zps0sspwppx.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot249_zps0sspwppx.png.html)

Kicker-B

Blok D styled booster.

[![screenshot264_zpssncydeii.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot264_zpssncydeii.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot264_zpssncydeii.png.html)

[![screenshot265_zps642uppwk.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot265_zps642uppwk.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot265_zps642uppwk.png.html)

Kicker-C

Star-37 inspired upper stage.

[![screenshot287_zpsetim5ihp.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot287_zpsetim5ihp.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot287_zpsetim5ihp.png.html)

[![screenshot288_zpspi5fshkk.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot288_zpspi5fshkk.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot288_zpspi5fshkk.png.html)

Kicker-D

Fregat inspired kicker.

[![screenshot1033_zpsrflxet6b.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot1033_zpsrflxet6b.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot1033_zpsrflxet6b.png.html)

[![screenshot1032_zpsnaujkoh6.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot1032_zpsnaujkoh6.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot1032_zpsnaujkoh6.png.html)

***#Post1000, everyone.***

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-26T14:48:15Z" title="03/26/2015 02:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 26, 2015</time> by Yukon0009**

These are wonderful pieces of work, Yukon! I especially like the inline command pod. Maybe you should add a small probe core so you can have a normal horizon?

Have some rep for the effort and to celebrate your 1000th post.
Ooh, they look adorably sophisticated! Great use of parts, too! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thank you Columbia.

Also, do you guys want moar stuff from me to add to here?
Awesome stuff! I really love the micro-LK lander.

Thank you!

@JPmAN I will when I have time.
How do you get into the spudnik pod, and the LGBL lander
Clip the camera into th pods, then find the command seat clipped inside them and board. Don't forget to reset the "control from" area to the probe.

> 
> Wow, so small, yet detailed!
> +rep

thank you, making these are actually quite simple to make.

So many cute and astonishing parts. It is hard to make small objects that are spot on in detail. You really have to know what parts to use to actually make it pass.

You made them pass!
